item.title: What Is Quantum Computing? The Complete WIRED Guide
item.description: Everything you ever wanted to know about qubits, superpositioning, and spooky action at a distance.
item.media:keywords: Wired Guide, quantum computing
item.dc:creator: Tom Simonite, Sophia Chen
item.dc:subject: WIRED Guides

item.title: Data Breaches: The Complete WIRED Guide
item.description: Everything you need to know about the past, present, and future of data security—from Equifax to Yahoo—and the problem with Social Security numbers.
item.media:keywords: data breach, equifax, Facebook, Yahoo, Wired Guide
item.dc:creator: Lily Hay Newman
item.dc:subject: Deep Dive

item.title: What Defines Artificial Intelligence? The Complete WIRED Guide
item.description: Supersmart algorithms won't take all the jobs, But they are learning faster than ever, doing everything from medical diagnostics to serving up ads.
item.media:keywords: Wired Guide, artificial intelligence
item.dc:creator: Tom Simonite
item.dc:subject: Deep Dive

item.title: What Is Blockchain? The Complete WIRED Guide
item.description: The idea of creating tamper-proof databases has captured the attention of everyone from anarchist techies to staid bankers.
item.media:keywords: Wired Guide, Blockchain, cryptocurrency, bitcoin, Finance, money
item.dc:creator: WIRED Staff
item.dc:subject: Deep Dive

item.title: What is 5G? The Complete Guide to When, Why, and How
item.description: Here’s everything you need to know about the spectrum, millimeter-wave technology, and what 5G means for you.
item.media:keywords: Wired Guide, 5g, Wireless, Cellphones, telecoms, FCC, Mobile, phones, smartphones
item.dc:creator: Klint Finley, Joanna Pearlstein, Simon Hill
item.dc:subject: Deep Dive

item.title: Self-Driving Cars: The Complete Guide
item.description: How a chaotic skunkworks race in the desert launched what's poised to be a runaway global industry.
item.media:keywords: Wired Guide, Self-Driving Cars, Autonomous Vehicles, Uber, Infrastructure
item.dc:creator: Alex Davies, Aarian Marshall
item.dc:subject: Deep Dive

item.title: What Is the Internet of Things? A WIRED Guide
item.description: What you need to know about the promise (and peril) of networked lightbulbs, ovens, cameras, speakers and, well … everything.
item.media:keywords: Wired Guide, internet of things
item.dc:creator: Arielle Pardes
item.dc:subject: Deep Dive

item.title: What is Crispr Gene Editing? The Complete WIRED Guide
item.description: Everything you need to know about how scientists can repurpose a bacterial immune system to alter DNA, making everything from cheap insulin to extra starchy corn.
item.media:keywords: Wired Guide, crispr, CRISPR/Cas9, genetic engineering
item.dc:creator: Megan Molteni, Grace Huckins
item.dc:subject: Deep Dive

item.title: What Is Net Neutrality? The Complete WIRED Guide
item.description: ISPs shouldn't be able to block some sorts of data and prioritize others—here's what to know about the struggle to treat information on the internet the same.
item.media:keywords: Wired Guide, Net Neutrality
item.dc:creator: Klint Finley
item.dc:subject: Deep Dive

item.title: The Complete History And Future of Robots
item.description: Everything you wanted to know about soft, hard, and nonmurderous automatons.

item.title: Climate Change: The Complete WIRED Guide
item.description: The world is getting warmer, the weather is getting worse. Here's everything you need to know about what humans can do to stop wrecking the planet.
item.media:keywords: Wired Guide, climate change, wildfires, Climate Week 2021
item.dc:creator: Katie M Palmer, Matt Simon

item.description: Everything you ever wanted to know about VR headsets, Oculus, Vive, and simulator sickness.

item.title: The WIRED Guide to Digital Security
item.description: In an age of nonstop breaches and hacks, here are ways to improve your online security based on your level of risk, from average user to NSA contractor.
item.media:keywords: Wired Guide, security, cybersecurity
item.dc:creator: WIRED Staff
item.dc:subject: Security

item.title: What Is Cyberwar? The Complete WIRED Guide
item.description: The threat of cyberwar looms over the future: a new dimension of conflict capable of leapfrogging borders and teleporting the chaos of war to civilians thousands of miles beyond its front.
